name: Quellentian
description:
Unified Oceania
The Quellentians are a tidewalker culture at home in the water. They communicate through songs, befriend sea creatures, and shape water with their magic.

options.name: Action: Tidal Surge
options.description: Create a surge of water that pushes all creatures within 10 units back 5 units and grants you a swim speed equal to double your movement for 1 round.

options.name: Oceanic Diplomacy
options.description: Gain +1 Persuasion and you can communicate basic concepts to any aquatic creature.

options.name: Deep Sea Adaptation
options.description: Gain +1 Athletics and you can hold your breath for 10 times longer than normal.
